overview:
Jordan has been working in web marketing and social media since 2004, as a marketing blogger, video creator and project manager. As Strutta’s Director of Marketing, he works with clients and agency personnel to help them create effective online contest campaigns. He is responsible for Strutta’s videos, including their infamous office lip dubs and Christmas videos, and also hosts the semi-regular live video show “Couch Beers.”

Prior to joining the Strutta team, Jordan was the Founder of Tell Ten Friends Marketing, a Vancouver-based social media consultancy. Previous to his foray into the web marketing space, he worked as a television producer for CHUM TV.

JordanBehan.com
